code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Monitoring(){const[stats,setStats]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{loadStats();},[]);async function loadStats(){const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await fetch('/api/monitoring',{headers:{'Authorization':'Bearer '+token}});if(res.ok)setStats(await res.json());}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Monitoring & Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Average Attendance: ",stats.avg_attendance?stats.avg_attendance.toFixed(2)+'%':'N/A']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Average Rating: ",stats.avg_rating?stats.avg_rating.toFixed(2):'N/A']})]});}
